data.title: The Culture: The Drawings
data.meta_description: This extraordinary collection celebrates the dazzling worldbuilding of Iain M. Banks, one of the most important and influential writers in modern science fiction. Faithfully reproduced from sketchbooks kept in the 1970s and 80s, these annotated original illustrations depict the ships, habitats, geography, weapons and language of the Banks’ Culture series of novels in incredible detail. Two editions available a standard edition and a deluxe edition.
